languages.text: "Но довольно об этом. Мой путь только начинается, и я жажду увидеть агонию еретиков. Идем же!"

traits.locale_text: "Но довольно об этом. Мой путь только начинается, и я жажду увидеть агонию еретиков. Идем же!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "But enough of this. My path has only just begun, and I crave to see the agony of heretics. Come!"
languages.original_text: "Но довольно об этом. Мой путь только начинается, и я жажду увидеть агонию еретиков. Идем же!"

traits.locale_text: "But enough of this. My path has only just begun, and I crave to see the agony of heretics. Come!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But enough of this. My path has only just begun, and I crave to see the agony of heretics. Come!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But enough of this. My path has only just begun, and I crave to see the agony of heretics. Come!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But enough of this. My path has only just begun, and I crave to see the agony of heretics. Come!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But enough of this. My path has only just begun, and I crave to see the agony of heretics. Come!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「だが、もうたくさんだ。我の道は始まったばかりだ。異端者の苦悩している様が見たいのだ。さあ！」
languages.original_text: "But enough of this. My path has only just begun, and I crave to see the agony of heretics. Come!"

traits.locale_text: 「だが、もうたくさんだ。我の道は始まったばかりだ。異端者の苦悩している様が見たいのだ。さあ！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “不过，话就说到这里吧。我的旅途才刚刚开始，我渴望看着那些异端分子受苦。快来吧！”
languages.original_text: "But enough of this. My path has only just begun, and I crave to see the agony of heretics. Come!"

traits.locale_text: “不过，话就说到这里吧。我的旅途才刚刚开始，我渴望看着那些异端分子受苦。快来吧！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Mais assez parlé. Ma croisade ne fait que commencer, et je brûle d'assister à l'agonie des hérétiques. En route ! »
languages.original_text: "But enough of this. My path has only just begun, and I crave to see the agony of heretics. Come!"

traits.locale_text: « Mais assez parlé. Ma croisade ne fait que commencer, et je brûle d'assister à l'agonie des hérétiques. En route ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Pero ya hemos hablado bastante. Mi camino acaba de empezar, y ansío ver la agonía de los herejes. ¡Vamos!».
languages.original_text: "But enough of this. My path has only just begun, and I crave to see the agony of heretics. Come!"

traits.locale_text: «Pero ya hemos hablado bastante. Mi camino acaba de empezar, y ansío ver la agonía de los herejes. ¡Vamos!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Doch genug davon. Mein Pfad ist erst am Anfang, und ich sehne mich nach der Agonie von Ketzern. Kommt!"
languages.original_text: "But enough of this. My path has only just begun, and I crave to see the agony of heretics. Come!"

traits.locale_text: "Doch genug davon. Mein Pfad ist erst am Anfang, und ich sehne mich nach der Agonie von Ketzern. Kommt!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Yetti artık. Yoluma daha yeni koyuldum, kâfirlerin acısına tanık olmanın açlığını çekiyorum. Hadi!"
languages.original_text: "But enough of this. My path has only just begun, and I crave to see the agony of heretics. Come!"

traits.locale_text: "Yetti artık. Yolum yeni başladı ve kâfirlerin acısına tanık olmanın açlığını çekiyorum. Hadi!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
